id: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu is not persisted between sessions.
OB: When the workbench is started, the MRU file list in the File menu does not retain the previously opened files from the last session.
EB: The MRU file list in the File menu should persist between sessions and display the previously opened files from the last session.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Start the workbench. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench and observe the File menu MRU list.
